Reviews.Title: “The hotel needs renovation”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 days location hotel quiet 5 minutes circo massimo metro station depending balcony nice view hotels yard size renovation dirty unpleasant smell probably coming dirty carpet hotel free wifi connection connection awful impossible especially peak time breakfast limited day nice coffee prepared polite employee believe hotel nice locationbut renovation

Reviews.Content: easily accessible stazione ostiense taxi cost 5 euros approx 5 minute journey quiet pretty location size lovely patiobalcony looking onto beautiful courtyard quality bed linen towels excellent en suite easy powerful shower virtually hot water towels replaced daily required useful electronic safe stocked mini bar continental breakfast buffet available 7am10am serving probably freshly coffee ive tasted location 10 min walk metro circo massimo journey termini costs 1 euro takes 5 mins ticket valid metro system 75 mins hotel return visit rome

Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay domus bit hotel near metro makes easy navigate rome location meant hotel quiet staff helpful spoke excellent english arrived ready invited breakfast waited cappuccinos

Reviews.Content: stayed domus 6 nights september quiet clean functionning air conditionning balcony overlooking courtyard flowers orange olive trees growing staff pleasant professional helpful worth booking taxi hotel picked airport return little restaurants walking distance hotel

Reviews.Title: “When you are tired of Rome, go the Aventine Hill and stay at the Hotel Domus Aventina”

Reviews.Content: located aventine green leafy residential neighborhood outside centro storico hotel sandwiched church grammar school roman standards single kingsize bed couch desk private terrace bathroom breakfast stocked stayed twice 2004 2010 stay drawbacks moderately uncomfortable bed pillow heard elevator occasions floor 6 steps lobby
